name: Wing chun Zombie Infinity Mastercard
description:
A Zombie with great skills in Wing Chun must find a special card that has been stolen by a Kun Khmer fighter.

Player Control
W A S D or Arrow keys to movement
Spacebar for dash 
M1 to Attack
M1 hold to use Chainpunch
M2 to Deflect
M1 hold + M2 hold to use One inch punch
